name: Spatial Media
tagline: Specifications and tools for 360ยบ video and spatial audio.
body:
# Overview

A collection of specifications and tools for 360° video and spatial audio.

## Specifications

- [Spatial Audio](docs/spatial-audio-rfc.md) metadata specification
- [Spherical Video](docs/spherical-video-rfc.md) metadata specification
- [Spherical Video V2](docs/spherical-video-v2-rfc.md) metadata specification

## Tools

- [Spatial Media Metadata Injector](https://github.com/google/spatial-media/releases/latest) for injecting spatial media metadata in media files.
- [Jump Inspector](https://g.co/jump/inspector), an Android app for previewing VR videos with spatial audio.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
